verses.verse: So all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were reckoned by <S%H3187>genealogies<s%>; <S%H3789>and<s%>, behold, they are written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> was carried <S%H1540>away<s%> captive to <S%H894>Babylon<s%> for their <S%H4604>transgression<s%>.

Now the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> that dwelt in their <S%H272>possessions<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities<s%> were <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and the <S%H5411>Nethinim<s%>.

And in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, and of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>:

Uthai <S%H5793><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H566>Imri<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1137>Bani<s%>, of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.
And of the <S%H7888>Shilonites<s%>: <S%H6222>Asaiah<s%> the <S%H1060>first-born<s%>, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>.
And of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%>: <S%H3262>Jeuel<s%>, and their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8673>ninety<s%>.

And of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>: <S%H5543>Sallu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1938>Hodaviah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5574>Hassenuah<s%>,

and <S%H2997>Ibneiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham<s%>, and <S%H425>Elah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5813>Uzzi<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4381>Michri<s%>, and <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8203>Shephatiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7467>Reuel<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2998>Ibnijah<s%>;

and their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, according to their <S%H8435>generations<s%>, <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%>. All these <S%H582>men<s%> were <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>.
And of the <S%H3548>priests<s%>: <S%H3048>Jedaiah<s%>, and <S%H3080>Jehoiarib<s%>, <S%H3199>Jachin<s%>,

and <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4812>Meraioth<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub<s%>, the <S%H5057>ruler<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>;

and <S%H5718>Adaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6583>Pashhur<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4441>Malchijah<s%>, and <S%H4640>Maasai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5717>Adiel<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3170>Jahzerah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4921>Meshillemith<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H564>Immer<s%>;

and their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>, a <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8346>threescore<s%>; very <S%H2428>able<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> for the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

And of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>: <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2815>Hasshub<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5840>Azrikam<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%>, of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>;

and <S%H1230>Bakbakkar<s%>, <S%H2792>Heresh<s%>, and <S%H1559>Galal<s%>, and <S%H4983>Mattaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4316>Mica<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2147>Zichri<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>,

and <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1559>Galal<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%>, and <S%H1296>Berechiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H511>Elkanah<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H2691>villages<s%> of the <S%H5200>Netophathites<s%>.

And the <S%H7778>porters<s%>: <S%H7967>Shallum<s%>, and <S%H6126>Akkub<s%>, and <S%H2929>Talmon<s%>, and <S%H289>Ahiman<s%>, and their <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H7967>(Shallum<s%> was the <S%H7218>chief<s%>),
who hitherto waited in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%>: they were the <S%H7778>porters<s%> for the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>.

And <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6981>Kore<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H43>Ebiasaph<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah<s%>, and his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, of his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, the <S%H7145>Korahites<s%>, were over the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%>, <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H5592>thresholds<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%>: and their <S%H1>fathers<s%> had been over the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H3996>entry<s%>.
And <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> was <S%H5057>ruler<s%> over them in time <S%H6440>past<s%>, and Jehovah was with <S%H3068>him<s%>.
450 <S%H2148><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4920>Meshelemiah<s%> was <S%H7778>porter<s%> of the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>.

All these that were <S%H1305>chosen<s%> to be <S%H7778>porters<s%> in the <S%H5592>thresholds<s%> were two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8147>twelve<s%>. These were reckoned by <S%H3187>genealogy<s%> in their <S%H2691>villages<s%>, <S%H1992>whom<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> the <S%H7200>seer<s%> did <S%H3245>ordain<s%> in their office of <S%H530>trust<s%>.

So they and their <S%H1121>children<s%> had the oversight of the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, even the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%>, by <S%H4931>wards<s%>.
On the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>sides<s%> were the <S%H7778>porters<s%>, toward the <S%H4217>east<s%>, <S%H3220>west<s%>, <S%H6828>north<s%>, and <S%H5045>south<s%>.
And their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, in their <S%H2691>villages<s%>, were to <S%H935>come<s%> in every <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> from <S%H6256>time<s%> to time to be with <S%H6256>them<s%>:

for the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1368>chief<s%> <S%H7778>porters<s%>, who were <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, were in an <S%H530>office<s%> of <S%H3957>trust<s%>, and were over the chambers and over the <S%H214>treasuries<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

And they <S%H3885>lodged<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, because the <S%H4931>charge<s%> thereof was upon <S%H4668>them<s%>; and to them pertained the opening thereof morning by <S%H1242>morning<s%>.

And certain <S%H5921>of<s%> them had charge <S%H5921>of<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> <S%H935>service<s%>; for by count were these brought in and by count were these taken <S%H3318>out<s%>.

Some of them also were <S%H4487>appointed<s%> over the <S%H3627>furniture<s%>, and over all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, and over the fine <S%H5560>flour<s%>, and the <S%H3196>wine<s%>, and the <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and the <S%H3828>frankincense<s%>, and the <S%H1314>spices<s%>.
And some of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H7543>prepared<s%> the <S%H4842>confection<s%> of the <S%H1314>spices<s%>.

And <S%H4993>Mattithiah<s%>, one of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, who was the <S%H1060>first-born<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> the <S%H7145>Korahite<s%>, had the <S%H530>office<s%> of trust over the things that were <S%H4639>baked<s%> in <S%H2281>pans<s%>.
And some of their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%>, were over the <S%H3899>showbread<s%>, to <S%H3559>prepare<s%> it every <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>.

And these are the <S%H7891>singers<s%>, <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, who dwelt in the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> and were <S%H6362>free<s%> from other <S%H4399>service<s%>; for they were employed in their work <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%>.

These were <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, throughout their <S%H8435>generations<s%>, <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H3427>men<s%>: these dwelt at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
And in <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> there <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%>, <S%H3273>Jeiel<s%>, whose <S%H802>wife<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4601>Maacah<s%>:
and his <S%H1060>first-born<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H5658>Abdon<s%>, and <S%H6698>Zur<s%>, and <S%H7027>Kish<s%>, and <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, and <S%H5369>Ner<s%>, and <S%H5070>Nadab<s%>,
and <S%H1446>Gedor<s%>, and <S%H283>Ahio<s%>, and <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%>, and <S%H4732>Mikloth<s%>.
And <S%H4732>Mikloth<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H8043>Shimeam<s%>. And they also <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> with their <S%H251>brethren<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, over against their <S%H251>brethren<s%>.

And <S%H5369>Ner<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H7027>Kish<s%>; and <S%H7027>Kish<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>; and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>, and <S%H4444>Malchi-shua<s%>, and <S%H41>Abinadab<s%>, and <S%H792>Eshbaal<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> was <S%H4807>Merib-baal<s%>; and <S%H4810>Merib-baal<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H4318>Micah<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah<s%>: <S%H6377>Pithon<s%>, and <S%H4429>Melech<s%>, and <S%H8475>Tahrea<s%>, and Ahaz.

And <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3294>Jarah<s%>; and <S%H3294>Jarah<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H5964>Alemeth<s%>, and <S%H5820>Azmaveth<s%>, and <S%H2174>Zimri<s%>; and <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H4162>Moza<s%>;
and <S%H4162>Moza<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H1150>Binea<s%>; and <S%H7509>Rephaiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H501>Eleasah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H682>Azel<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And <S%H682>Azel<s%> had <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, whose <S%H8034>names<s%> are <S%H5840>these<s%>: Azrikam, <S%H1074>Bocheru<s%>, and <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>, and <S%H8187>Sheariah<s%>, and <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%>, and <S%H2605>Hanan<s%>: these were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H682>Azel<s%>.
